page.title: 14ROCKLEY SANDS
page.content: {Rockley Sands}was opened in 1956. It covers about 100 acres and there are about 1,000 caravans on the site. Visitors are also allowed to bring their own caravans and tents (they are also permitted to bring small house trained pets). {Visitors}come from all over the country and there and there are many facilities for them which are also open to the public. There is a penguin club for the{children}which offers daily activities. There is crazy golf and football coaching, a large swimming pool and a shallow pool,there is an amusement centre, a go cart track and cycle road safety track. In the{evening}there is a theatre, ballroom, disco and a pub. It is a lovely place to spend your holiday.
